de.zabuza.armA2.ace.zeroed.calculation

Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.armA2.ace.zeroed.calculation.Calculator

  • public final class Calculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class. Can calculate elevation, wind and air routes.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double TWO_DECIMALS
      Factor which shifts a value in the decimal system for 2 positions.
      static int WIND_VALUE
      Standard value of the wind for the range tables.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int calculateAirRoute(int directDistance, int altitudeDifference)
      Calculates the air route to a target using the direct distance and the altitude difference.

      Calculates the elevation in mil for a given distance using two surrounding entries.
      static double calculateWind(int distance, double crosswind, DataEntry closerEntry, DataEntry furtherEntry)
      Calculates the wind correction in mil for a given distance and crosswind using two surrounding entries.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateAirRoute

        public static int calculateAirRoute(int directDistance,
                    int altitudeDifference)
        Calculates the air route to a target using the direct distance and the altitude difference.
        Parameters:
        directDistance - direct distance to the target
        altitudeDifference - altitude difference
        Returns:
        air route to a target in meter

      • calculateElevation

        public static double calculateElevation(int distance,
                        DataEntry closerEntry,
                        DataEntry furtherEntry)
        Calculates the elevation in mil for a given distance using two surrounding entries.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance to the target
        closerEntry - data entry with a closer distance
        furtherEntry - data entry with a further distance
        Returns:
        elevation in mil for the given distance

      • calculateWind

        public static double calculateWind(int distance,
                   double crosswind,
                   DataEntry closerEntry,
                   DataEntry furtherEntry)
        Calculates the wind correction in mil for a given distance and crosswind using two surrounding entries.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance to the target
        crosswind - current crosswind
        closerEntry - data entry with a closer distance
        furtherEntry - data entry with a further distance
        Returns:
        wind correction in mil for the given distance
